mapper.select: select 0 as TargetNodeId, c.targetNode as targetNode from wcmchannel a, (select a.hiera || '~' || b.sitedesc as targetNode from (select LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(chnldesc, '~')) KEEP(DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY rownum), ',') AS hiera from wcmchannel start with channelid = replace((select docchannel from wcmdocument where docid =#{docid} ),'-','') connect by prior parentid = channelid) a, (select sitedesc from wcmwebsite where siteid = (select siteid from wcmchannel where channelid = replace((select docchannel from wcmdocument where docid = #{docid} ),'-',''))) b) c, (select nvl2(docpuburl, '2', '3') as publishstate from wcmdocument where docid = #{docid} ) d where channelid = (select replace(docchannel,'-','') from wcmdocument where docid = #{docid} )
select LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(nodename, '~')) KEEP(DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY rownum), ',') AS TargetNode from typestruct start with nodeid =#{nodeid} connect by prior parentid = nodeid
select * from pagelayout where articleid=#{articleid} and masterid<>nodeid

select 1 as Action,1 as ArticleType, 'TRSWCM' as sourceSystem, d.publishstate as publishstate, 1 as ObjectType, 2 as TargetLib from wcmchannel a, (select a.hiera || '~' || b.sitedesc as targetNode from (select LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(chnldesc, '~')) KEEP(DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY rownum), ',') AS hiera from wcmchannel start with channelid = replace((select docchannel from wcmdocument where docid = #{docid}),'-','') connect by prior parentid = channelid) a, (select sitedesc from wcmwebsite where siteid = (select siteid from wcmchannel where channelid = replace((select docchannel from wcmdocument where docid = #{docid}),'-',''))) b) c, (select nvl2(docpuburl, '2', '3') as publishstate from wcmdocument where docid = #{docid}) d where channelid = (select replace(docchannel,'-','') from wcmdocument where docid = #{docid})
